name: Hands of Wisp
description:
Control the energy called Wisp in an Action RPG, surviving againts various
unknown creatures and crossing maps and scenarios. Question together with
Wisp the how generic and empty your mission can be and what this whole
universe means.

Inspired by Action RPG Games. Hands of Wisp is simple, but elaborates with
much affection. Advance through maps and scenarios defeating enemies who
try to stop while you try to discover your motivation. Throughout the game,
discover the weight of the empty and how this is important for all beings
in this universe.

Features:
- Explore the sceneries of Cave, Snow, Water Distortion, Electric Zone and
one last dark scenario.

- Gradually be able to control elements that will help you to cross the
scenarios and can influence against certain enemies.

- Defeat the strongest creature of each scenario so that Wisp can summon
a new element.

- Explore the dialogues gradually to try to understand the entire Game
Universe and the motivation of the characters.
